languages.text: "Мы не свита, {name}, — мы аколиты. Что касается твоего вопроса — я ближе всех к тому, кого принято называть личным учеником. Лорд-инквизитор счел меня достойным того, чтобы поручать мне самые ответственные и щепетильные задания, требующие внимания агентов {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Мы не свита, {name} — мы последователи. Что касается твоего вопроса — я ближе всех к тому, кого принято называть личным учеником. Лорд Инквизитор счел меня достойным того, чтобы поручать мне самые ответственные и щепетильные задания, требующие внимания агентов Золотого трона".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "We are not a retinue, {name} — we are acolytes. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."
languages.original_text: "Мы не свита, {name}, — мы аколиты. Что касается твоего вопроса — я ближе всех к тому, кого принято называть личным учеником. Лорд-инквизитор счел меня достойным того, чтобы поручать мне самые ответственные и щепетильные задания, требующие внимания агентов {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "We are not a retinue, {name} — we are followers. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the Golden Throne."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We are not a retinue, {name} — we are followers. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We are not a retinue, {name} — we are followers. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the Golden Throne."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We are not a retinue, {name} — we are acolytes. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我们不是随行人员，{name}，我们是侍仆。至于你的问题，我比其余的人都要更加接近我的私人导师。大审判官认为，我有资格处理那些最重要、最敏感，需要{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的代理人特别关注的任务。”
languages.original_text: "We are not a retinue, {name} — we are acolytes. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “我们不是随行人员，{name}，我们是侍仆。至于你的问题，我比其余的人都要更加接近我的私人导师。审判长认为，我有资格处理那些最重要、最敏感，需要{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的代理人特别关注的任务。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "We are not a retinue,  — we are acolytes. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the Golden Throne."

languages.text: «No somos un séquito, {name}, somos acólitos. En cuanto a su pregunta, estoy más cerca que nadie de quien considero mi maestro personal. El Lord Inquisidor me consideró digno de realizar las tareas más importantes y delicadas que requieren la atención de los agentes del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}».
languages.original_text: "We are not a retinue, {name} — we are acolytes. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «No somos un séquito, {name}, somos acólitos. En cuanto a su pregunta, estoy más cerca que nadie de quien considero mi maestro personal. El Lord Inquisidor me consideró digno de realizar las tareas más importantes y delicadas que requieren la atención de los agentes del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「私たちは従者ではないのだ、{name}。 我々はアコライトだ。質問の件だが、私は個人的な師と呼ぶ者に誰よりも近い存在だ。ロード・インクィジターは、私が{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}のエージェントによる注意を必要とする、最も重要かつ繊細な仕事を引き受けるにふさわしいと判断されたのだ」
languages.original_text: "We are not a retinue, {name} — we are acolytes. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは従者ではないのだ、{name}。 我々はアコライトだ。質問の件だが、私は個人的な師と呼ぶ者に誰よりも近い存在だ。ロード・インクィジターは、私が{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}のエージェントによる注意を必要とする、最も重要かつ繊細な仕事を引き受けるにふさわしいと判断されたのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wir sind kein Gefolge, {name} — wir sind Akolythen. Und was Eure Frage angeht, ich stehe meinem persönlichen Lehrer näher als jeder andere. Der Großinquisitor hielt mich für würdig, die wichtigsten und heikelsten Aufgaben der Agenten des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} zu übernehmen."
languages.original_text: "We are not a retinue, {name} — we are acolytes. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind kein Gefolge, {name} — wir sind Akolythen. Und was Eure Frage angeht, ich stehe meinem persönlichen Lehrer näher als jeder andere. Der Großinquisitor hielt mich für würdig, die wichtigsten und heikelsten Aufgaben der Agenten des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g} zu übernehmen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Nous ne sommes pas un entourage, {name}, mais des acolytes. Pour répondre à votre question, je suis plus proche que n'importe qui d'autre de celui que j'aime appeler mon mentor. Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a estimé suffisamment digne pour me confier les missions les plus importantes et les plus délicates nécessitant l'intervention d'agents du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "We are not a retinue, {name} — we are acolytes. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne sommes pas un entourage, {name}, mais des acolytes. Pour répondre à votre question, je suis plus proche que n'importe qui d'autre de celui que j'aime appeler mon mentor. Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a estimé suffisamment digne pour me confier les missions les plus importantes et les plus délicates nécessitant l'intervention d'agents du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Maiyet değiliz {name}, havariyiz. Soruna gelirsek... Öğretmenim dediğim kişiye herkesten çok yakınım. Lord Engizisyoncu, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} hizmetkârlarının üstlenebileceği en önemli ve hassas görevleri bana layık görmüştür."
languages.original_text: "We are not a retinue, {name} — we are acolytes. As for your question, I am closer than anyone else to the one I call my personal teacher. The Lord Inquisitor deemed me worthy of undertaking the most important and sensitive tasks requiring the attention of agents of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Maiyet değiliz {name}, havariyiz. Soruna gelirsek... Öğretmenim dediğim kişiye herkesten çok yakınım. Lord Engizisyoncu, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht{/g} hizmetkârlarının üstlenebileceği en önemli ve hassas görevleri bana layık görmüştür."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
